DOC.brief_summary: AQUACEL® foam adhesive dressing sterile Hydrofiber® foam wound dress consist waterproof outer polyurethane film , multi-layered absorbent pad , silicone adhesive border . The multi-layered absorbent pad contain layer polyurethane foam non-woven wound contact layer Hydrofiber® ( NaCMC ) . This dress product launch 2012 . A new source silicone adhesive assessment product .
